sentence.Network_en: They really believed that the treaty of Versailles was iniquitously injust.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们确实相信凡尔赛条约是极为不公平的.

list.abs: an iniquitous system , regime , etc., 罪恶的制度 , 政权等.
" It certainly is a most iniquitous affair , " said Mr. Bennet , " and nothing can clear Mr. Collins from the guilt of inheriting Longbourn .“这的确是一最不公道的事，”班纳特先生说，“柯林斯先生要继承浪博恩的产业，他这桩罪过是洗也洗不清的。
